nodes.text: Sano Thrica was a male Twi'lek living during the Galactic War. At some point he became part of the Order of Revan, joining with the Revanite forces on Yavin 4. Thrica and his fellow Revanites tried to stop a strike team from reaching Revan and the temple of Sacrifice artifact, but were defeated and killed.
Sano Thrica appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
